title: Cycle through country regions for wallpapers
description: Instead of single region, cycle through available Bing regions daily to get more variety in wallpapers
close_reason: Implemented region cycling with 12 regions. Each hourly run uses next region in rotation.

title: Explore day/night wallpaper options
description: Research possibilities for having different wallpapers for day vs night. Explore macOS APIs, Bing API options, or other creative solutions
